ai-tha-ap556:1.4_0: I’ll make a storm for the sake of my own austerities.
ai-tha-ap556:2.1_0: Thirty-Three, having gone to the realm of the Thirty-Three,
ai-tha-ap556:2.2_0: having drunk the drop of a sick person,
ai-tha-ap556:2.3_0: I ask you to become lord of the gods.
ai-tha-ap556:2.4_0: the fruit of good and bad deeds.
ai-tha-ap556:3.2_0: I walked meditation up and down the path,
ai-tha-ap556:3.4_0: the fruit of good and bad deeds.
ai-tha-ap556:4.2_0: of the Buddha with the psychic power of the sun.
ai-tha-ap556:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap556:6.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap556:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kimbila.
